entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Dec 09 2024
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 2 December 2024 through Monday, 9 December 2024üîó

Browser Support Changes: +12, -0

Support increases (12)

CSS

  1. css ‚ûû properties ‚ûû text-box
    Added to Chrome  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines
  2. css ‚ûû properties ‚ûû text-box ‚ûû normal

    Added to Chrome  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines

    Added to Chrome  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines

    Added to Chrome  ‚ûû  2 of 3 engines
  10. css ‚ûû types ‚ûû color ‚ûû hsl ‚ûû mixed_type_parameters
    Added to Safari  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  11. css ‚ûû types ‚ûû color ‚ûû hwb ‚ûû mixed_type_parameters
    Added to Safari  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  12. css ‚ûû types ‚ûû color ‚ûû rgb ‚ûû mixed_type_parameters
    Added to Safari  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 25

Show all 25 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (14)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 29 November 2024, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

CSS

  1. css ‚ûû properties ‚ûû text-wrap ‚ûû stable
    Backfilled for Chrome  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  2. css ‚ûû properties ‚ûû text-wrap-mode

    Backfilled for Chrome  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  4. css ‚ûû properties ‚ûû text-wrap-mode ‚ûû wrap
    Backfilled for Chrome  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions ‚ûû api ‚ûû scripting ‚ûû RegisteredContentScript ‚ûû world
    Backfilled for Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines

API

  1. api ‚ûû HTMLFencedFrameElement ‚ûû sandbox
    Backfilled for Chrome  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines
  2. api ‚ûû HTMLInputElement ‚ûû alpha
    Backfilled for Safari  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines
  3. api ‚ûû HTMLInputElement ‚ûû colorSpace
    Backfilled for Safari  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines

    Backfilled for Safari  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines
  2. html ‚ûû elements ‚ûû input ‚ûû colorspace
    Backfilled for Safari  ‚ûû  1 of 3 engines

SVG

  1. svg ‚ûû global_attributes ‚ûû stop-color
    Backfilled for Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines

    Backfilled for Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines

WEBASSEMBLY

  2. webassembly ‚ûû typedFunctionReferences
    Backfilled for Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines

New entries (9)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 29 November 2024, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (‚ÄúRemoved BCD entries‚Äù) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.
